lines.gurmukhi: pwqr mY jYsy bhu ibMjn prosIAq; Bojn kY fwrIAq pwvY nwih Twm ko [

Unknown.translation: Just as several eatables are served in a big leaf but after eating these dishes, the leaf is thrown away. Then it has no place in one's scheme of things.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ p`ql ivc bhuqy Bojn prosIdy hn iPr Bojn Kw ky jd su`t dyeIdI hY qwˆ auh jUZTI p`ql ikqy itkwxw nhIˆ pwauˆdI[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy hI qmol rs rsnw rswie Kwie; fwrIAY augwr nwih rhY AwF dwm ko [

Unknown.translation: Just as betel leaf extract is obtained by masticating the leaf and after enjoying the extract, the residue is thrown away. It is not worth even half a shell.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ ik rsnw nwl rsw rsw ky pwn dw rs cUs leIdw hY iPr auh Pog ho igAw pwn augwlky su`t dyeIdw hY auh iPr kaufI mu`l dw BI nhIˆ rihMdw[

lines.gurmukhi: PUln ko hwr aur Dwr bws lIjY jYsy; pwCY fwr dIjY khY hY n kwhU kwm ko [

Unknown.translation: Just as a garland of flowers is worn around the neck and sweet smell of the flowers is enjoyed, but once these flowers wither away, these are thrown away saying that they are no good now.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Pu`lwˆ dw hwr ijvyˆ gly ivc pw ky vwsnw lY leIdI hY jd kumlw jwvy qwˆ ipCoˆ ieh kih ky ik iksy kMm dw nhIˆ hY, su`t dyeIdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy kys nK Qwn iBRst n suhwq kwhU; ipRX ibCurq soeI sUq BXo bwm ko [615[

Unknown.translation: Just as hair and nails if plucked from their actual place are very uncomfortable and painful, such is the state of a woman separated from love of her husband.  (615)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ vwl qy nhuM Awpxy Qwˆ qoˆ if`gy hoey iksy nUM cMgy nhIˆ lgdy, iqvyˆ pIAw dy C`f id`iqAwˆ iesqRI dw hwl huMdw hY]615]
